Tables

  • Main info
  • Tables

Documentation for tables and table components.

Files

app/styles/modules/_tables.scss

Contents

  • Tables

Tables

Basic table can be created by using class .table on standard HTML table.

Example:
No. Lorem Ipsum Dolor
1 Et fugiat Voluptate dolore 979
2 Quis deserunt Aliqua sint laboris ut 814
3 Voluptate dolore Aliqua sint laboris ut 436
Code:
<table class="table">
  ...
</table>

Simple

To create simplier version of table add additional class .table--simple.

Example:
No. Lorem Ipsum Dolor
1 Et fugiat Voluptate dolore 979
2 Quis deserunt Aliqua sint laboris ut 814
3 Voluptate dolore Aliqua sint laboris ut 436
Code:
<table class="table table--simple">
  ...
</table>

Striped

To create striped version of table simple ad additional class .table--striped.

Example:
No. Lorem Ipsum Dolor
1 Et fugiat Voluptate dolore 979
2 Quis deserunt Aliqua sint laboris ut 814
3 Voluptate dolore Aliqua sint laboris ut 436
Code:
<table class="table table--striped">
  ...
</table>

Clean

To create clean no bordered version of table simple ad additional class .table--clean.

Example:
1 Et fugiat Voluptate dolore 979
2 Quis deserunt Aliqua sint laboris ut 814
3 Voluptate dolore Aliqua sint laboris ut 436
Code:
<table class="table table--clean">
  ...
</table>

Adaptive Table

To create adaptive table add additional class .table--adaptive. Adaptive table will be displayed as block on mobile devices. Use data-label attribute on td to define label for each column for mobile devices.

Example:
First column Second column Third column Fourth column
1 Et fugiat Voluptate dolore 979
2 Quis deserunt Aliqua sint laboris ut 814
Code:
<table class="table table--adaptive table--clean">
  <tr>
    <th>First column</th>
    <th>Second column</th>
    <th>Third column</th>
    <th>Fourth column</th>
  </tr>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td data-label="First column">1</td>
      <td data-label="Second column">Et fugiat</td>
      <td data-label="Third column">Voluptate dolore</td>
      <td data-label="Fourth column">979</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td data-label="First column">2</td>
      <td data-label="Second column">Quis deserunt</td>
      <td data-label="Third column">Aliqua sint laboris ut</td>
      <td data-label="Fourth column">814</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
